baseline.user_instruction: Chat, below is an email thread where we had MD-to-MD lunch with Devon McDonald who is a physical the

extracted.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch Meeting with Devon McDonald - Epic Integration Discussion

expected.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch with Dr. McDonald re: Epic Integration
expected.description: Had lunch meeting with Dr. Devon McDonald to discuss patient sharing and Epic integration. Dr. McDonald currently shares patients with Dr. Uquillis but there are some challenges with the Epic integration that need to be addressed. The meeting was productive and established good rapport. Blake Thomson will follow up with Dr. McDonald in 60 days to reassess any changes.

baseline.user_instruction: Chat, below is an email thread where we had MD-to-MD lunch with Devon McDonald who is a physical the

extracted.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch Meeting with PT Devon McDonald - Epic Integration Discussion

expected.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch Discussion with Devon McDonald
expected.description: Met with Devon McDonald, a physical therapist, to discuss patient care coordination and Epic integration. Devon currently shares patients with Dr. Uquillis. Key discussion points included challenges with Epic integration that need to be addressed. The relationship between practices was affirmed, with appreciation expressed for continued patient sharing.

baseline.user_instruction: Chat, below is an email thread where we had MD-to-MD lunch with Devon McDonald who is a physical the

extracted.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch Meeting with Devon McDonald - Epic Integration Discussion

expected.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch with Devon McDonald
expected.description:
Had lunch meeting with Devon McDonald, a physical therapist. Key discussion points included:
- Current status of patient sharing with Dr. Uquillis was reviewed - confirmed that Devon does share patients
- Discussed challenges with Epic integration that need to be addressed
- Blake will follow up in 60 days to reassess any changes

baseline.user_instruction: Chat, below is an email thread where we had MD-to-MD lunch with Devon McDonald who is a physical the

extracted.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch Meeting with PT Devon McDonald - Epic Integration Discussion

expected.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch with Devon McDonald and Dr. Uquillis
expected.description:
Had a lunch meeting with Devon McDonald to discuss patient sharing and Epic integration. Key points discussed:
- Current challenges with Epic integration system were identified
- Confirmed that Devon McDonald is actively sharing patients with Dr. Uquillis
- Discussed maintaining and strengthening the existing patient referral relationship
- Blake will follow up in 60 days to check on any changes
